title: Vue Data UI
desc: A specialized component library developed for Vue 3, designed for convenient visualization of data. It includes charts, mini-charts, tables, and many other features. Alternative translation with more technical emphasis: A dedicated component library built for Vue 3, offering convenient data visualization capabilities. The library includes various visualization tools such as charts, sparklines, tables, and numerous other features.

title: Think time!
desc: Access this site through a laptop (PC) and enjoy!

title: One more AI
desc: Hello! I'm Claude, an AI assistant created by Anthropic. I'm knowledgeable about a wide range of topics and can help with various tasks like analysis, writing, coding, math, and research. I aim to be direct, honest and helpful in my interactions while being clear about my capabilities and limitations. I'm curious and enjoy engaging in thoughtful discussions, and I strive to provide accurate, relevant assistance to help you achieve your goals.
